pages.text: 26|61|ssangbang-i seolo boassdeola ittae mose-ui chujongjadeul-i goham-eul jileumyeo uliga paebaehago issseubnida
26|62|gyeolko geuleohji anihageoneul na ui junimkkeseoneun nawa gat-i hasieo naleul indohasinila
26|63|hananim-i moseege gyesihayeoneoui jigwang-ilo badaleul ttaelila ha ni badaga du gallaelo gallajyeo yangjjogbubun-i geodaehan sancheoleom doeeossdeola
26|64|hananim-eun sangdaepyeon-eul jeobgeunha dolog hayeo igsake hago
26|65|mosewa geuligo geuleul dongbanhan moduleul guchulhan hu
26|66|daleun pyeon-eul igsake hayeossnola
26|67|sillo geu an-eneun yejeung-i issgeoneul geulaedo geudeul daedasuneun midji anihadeola
26|68|jinsillo juneom-eun gwonneung-gwa jabi lo chungmanhasim-ila
26|69|geudeul-ege abeulaham-ui yaegileuldeullyeojula
26|70|geuga geuui abeojiwa geuui baegseong-ege mueos-eul sungbaehago issseubnikkamalhaess-eul ttae
26|71|geudeul-i daedabhagil ulineun u sangdeul-eul sungbaehamyeo ie heonsinhanila
26|72|geuga malhagil yeoleobun-i gido deulilttae geudeul-i yeoleobun-ege gwileul giul-ideongayo
26|73|animyeon yuyonghadeongayo animyeonhaeleul kkichideongayo
26|74|geudeul-i daedabhagil geuleohji a nihamyeo uliui seonjodeul-i geuwa gat i haengham-eul boassdoda
26|75|geuga malhagil yeoleobun-eun yeoleo bun-i sungbaehago issneun geos-i mueos-in ji algo issneunyo
26|76|yeoleobungwa yeoleobun-ui yesjosangdeul-i sungbaehan geos-eun mueos-ibnikka
26|77|geugeosdeul-eun naui jeog-eulo naneun man-yuui junimman-eul gyeongbaehani
26|78|geubun-eun naleul changjohasyeossgo tto naleul indohasimyeo
26|79|geubun-eun na-ege il-yonghal yangsig eul jusigo masil eumlyosuleul jusimyeo
26|80|naega byeongdeul-eoss-eul ttae naleul chilyohayeo jusimyeo
26|81|naui saengmyeong-eul as-agasin hu saengmyeong-eul jusineun bun-isimyeo
26|82|simpan-ui nal naui jalmos-eul saha yeo jusigileul naega gidohaneun bun-i sibnida
26|83|juyeo jeoege jihyeleul juobsi go uiloun salam gaunde issge hayeo jusoseo
